suggest.amasty\/shopby-graphql: Install shopby-graph-ql module to activate GraphQl and Shopby integration.
suggest.amasty\/module-grouped-options: Install module-grouped-options module to activate Grouped Options integration.
suggest.amasty\/module-shopby-mftf-2: Install module-shopby-mftf-2 module to implement mftf-tests for Magento 2.3.6+ versions.
suggest.amasty\/module-shopby-mftf-3: Install module-shopby-mftf-3 module to implement mftf-tests for Magento 2.4.1+ versions.
